member.name: MFDepthMeasurement
member.summary: Specifies the measurement system for a depth value in a video frame.

member.name: MFDepthMeasurement.DistanceToFocalPlane
member.summary: The measurement is the distance to the focal plane.

member.name: MFDepthMeasurement.DistanceToOpticalCenter
member.summary: The measurement is the distance to the optical center.
